corrupted_treant.name: Corrupted Treant
corrupted_treant.lore: Once a guardian of the forest, now twisted by dark magic.

defeatDialogue.speaker: spirit
defeatDialogue.text: The corruption runs deep, {playerName}. But you've freed this ancient being.

lich_king.name: The Lich King
lich_king.lore: A powerful necromancer who sought immortality and found only undeath.

defeatDialogue.speaker: boss
defeatDialogue.text: You think... this ends me? My master... will avenge...

defeatDialogue.speaker: spirit
defeatDialogue.text: He was one of the Shadow King's generals, {playerName}. There are more.

mech_overlord.name: Mech Overlord
mech_overlord.lore: The city's defense system, corrupted and turned against its creators.

defeatDialogue.speaker: player
defeatDialogue.text: I remember now... I helped build these machines.

defeatDialogue.speaker: spirit
defeatDialogue.text: Your past life was that of an inventor, {playerName}. Before you became a warrior.

dragon_lord.name: Dragon Lord Pyraxis
dragon_lord.lore: The mightiest dragon, once an ally, now consumed by shadow fire.

defeatDialogue.speaker: boss
defeatDialogue.text: Thank... you... old friend... I am free...

defeatDialogue.speaker: player
defeatDialogue.text: Pyraxis... I remember you. We fought together.

defeatDialogue.speaker: spirit
defeatDialogue.text: The corruption is broken! Pyraxis's spirit is at peace now, {playerName}.

shadow_king.name: The Shadow King
shadow_king.lore: The embodiment of darkness itself, seeking to plunge the world into eternal night.

defeatDialogue.speaker: boss
defeatDialogue.text: IMPOSSIBLE! I am ETERNAL! I am DARKNESS ITSELF!

defeatDialogue.speaker: player
defeatDialogue.text: Even darkness fades when the light is strong enough!

defeatDialogue.speaker: boss
defeatDialogue.text: This... is not... the end... I will return... I ALWAYS return...

defeatDialogue.speaker: spirit
defeatDialogue.text: It's over, {playerName}. You've done it. The Shadow King is truly destroyed!
